name: Ballermann III: The Expendabuilds
description:
My fourth Ludum Dare!

Shoot. Shoot some more. Shoot way way more than before and maybe you will probably loose anyway, so enjoy the music.

Rules:

  • complete rows with blocks
  • completing rows fast rewards more points
  • not using blocks reduces points
  • rows spawn over time at the bottom

Controls:

  • mouse click to shoot at blocks
  • 'r' key to restart
  • 'escape' key to quit

Used tools:

  • Unity3D 2017.2.0
  • Photoshop CC
  • Audacity
  • https://soundation.com/studio
  • https://www.freesoundeffects.com
  • http://labbed.net/software/labchirp/
  • Font: Monoton from https://www.fontsquirrel.com/

LD41-URL: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/ballermann-iii-the-expendabuilds

Thanks for playing :)

Daniel "xoidberg" Hein
